changeSet.author: abhijeet.hambir
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE PROCEDURE [ViWeb].[SaveVIwebAccessToken] @key varchar(100), @value varchar(200), @id int output AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; IF EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM ViWeb.ViwebAccessToken WHERE [key]=@key and [value]=@value) BEGIN DELETE FROM ViWeb.ViwebAccessToken WHERE [key]=@key and [value]=@value END IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM ViWeb.ViwebAccessToken WHERE [key]=@key and [value]=@value) BEGIN INSERT INTO ViWeb.ViwebAccessToken([key],[value]) VALUES (@key,@value) SET @id=SCOPE_IDENTITY() RETURN @id END END
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON ViWeb.SaveVIwebAccessToken TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON ViWeb.SaveVIwebAccessToken FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE ViWeb.SaveVIwebAccessToken;
